releaseNotes: Emergency hotfix addressing critical server startup issues: (1) Fixed missing AssemblyAI dependency causing ModuleNotFoundError on startup; (2) Resolved undefined variable errors in coaching_sessions.py by adding proper imports for Client model; (3) Removed non-existent module imports (TranscriptSegment, SpeakerRole) that caused import failures; (4) Added missing newline at end of dependencies.py to fix W292 linting issue; (5) Verified server startup and API functionality in TEST_MODE works correctly; (6) Confirmed /api/v1/plans/current endpoint returns proper JSON data. All critical functionality restored: server starts without errors, API endpoints respond correctly, TEST_MODE functions properly, database connectivity working.
author: Coachly Team
